thread.title: Very good by New York standards
thread.title_full: Very good by New York standards - Review of Dumont NYC-an Affinia hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: ristokrat
title: Very good by New York standards
text:
We stayed there for a week while the Westminster Dog Show was on. It is well located, near to subway, and stores and restaurants. Staff are friendly. A late checkout at no extra charge. Small kitchen with stove, microwave, full fridge, dishwasher. Separate bedroom and living room. Pet friendly. Staff are friendly and helpful. We felt the customer was respected and liked. We didn't think we were just one of hundreds. It may not be the flashiest in NYC, but it certainly was extremely comfortable.
Room Tip: For longer stays, more space is always better. The 30th floor views were spectacular. See more room tips
